intro: Defend your cat towers from hordes of monsters with a power of match-3
description:
Welcome to Cats on Duty, the purr-fectly hilarious and action-packed ultimate mix of real-time strategy, tower defense, and match-3 genres. It's an addictive game where heavily armed battle-hardened cat veterans of rodent skirmishes and yarn tangles defend their homeland (and litter boxes) against the forces of great evil! Choose your heroes from a range of cat warriors and participate in combat against 50 types of devilish creatures. Unleash the power of fluffiness and drive those zombies back to the depths of the underworld!

Tactical Tower Defense:
Defend your territory with a vast arsenal of brutal weapons. Choose from powerful rifles that reach the enemy at a distance to blades sharper than any groomer's scissors. Come up with a strategy and place your feline soldiers to ensure victory on the battlefield.

Match-3 Mayhem:
It's not just tower defense; it's tower defense with a twist of addictive match-3 gameplay! Connect the gems on the resource field to receive currency and purchase cat towers. Swap and combine cats on the battlefield to create upgraded towers and unleash devastating attacks. Cats on Duty takes the best of the genre and enhances it with captivating match-3 mechanics.

Unleash the Cattitude:
Prepare for epic cat fights, playful tricks, and adorable meows. Let your feline warriors show off their unique personalities and special abilities. Be ready for a blend of sassiness and strategy that will keep you entertained throughout the battles.

Epic Battles:
Face off against formidable foes that will make your whiskers tremble. Zombies, skeletons, spiders, Baba Yaga, and EPIC bosses can’t wait to see your tactical prowess. Sharpen your claws, load your shotguns, and show them who's the real top cat on the battlefield!

Customize and Improve your Squad:
Unlock and collect a variety of quirky cat characters each with their own strengths and abilities. From snipers and assassins to Rambo-like felines and even a warrior version of Cat in Boots. Tailor your team to your playstyle and create the ultimate squad of kitty heroes. Gather three kittens in a row and witness the birth of a SUPER WARRIOR CAT!

Unique Environments:
Explore diverse and meticulously crafted levels from suspiciously cozy suburban backyards to a mysterious desert. Each environment presents unique challenges that require creating cunning strategies in order to emerge victorious.

Charming Pixel-Cat Graphics:
Plunge yourself into a vibrant and whimsical world filled with colorful environments and adorable cat animations. This visual feast will immerse you right in the midst of a kitty adventure!

Get your paws on Cats on Duty now and let the cat-astrophe begin! And remember, in the world of Cats on Duty, some enemies may have nine lives, but they've never faced a cat army like yours before!
